response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary piece is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe its true value lies well beyond $10,000. However, to make this opportunity accessible, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to own this masterpiece at an exceptional price of $15,000. This is a special opportunity to secure a piece that could appreciate in value over time and potentially become a cherished asset. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your collection or fulfill your needs. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 15000}
